Description: Shoulder sherd from North Ionian black-figured pottery dinos or krater; interior reserved; exterior slipped and worn: traces of decoration at base of neck; glazed ridge at turn to shoulder; tongues, some red, at top of shoulder, band with addred band lined in white below; in frieze below head of lion to right and rosette fill.
Curator's comments: Joins 1924,1201.982, and from same vase as 1924,1201.987 and 1017.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.430)
